ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s face the day
with the same... Clang! The same energy as 
always!
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
It’s nothing special, but...you can have this if
you like.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I hope you find it useful...
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I have something to give you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
It’s not much, but this is to thank you for all you’ve
done for me.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2103_01_10: Er... Umm, this is...from me! Please accept it.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2103_02_10: Presents are lovely, don’t you think?
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
Even I feel all warm and fuzzy, and I’m the one
who gave it to you!
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Umm... Would you like to talk?
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2202_01_10: So, what shall we talk about?
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I like the stories you tell me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Th-thank you... I was just a little surprised to
receive something so wonderful!
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
That was fun. Let’s do it again when you have
some time.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
It’s lovely having someone you can laugh with and
talk to about anything, don’t you think?
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8001_0701_01_10: This place is really relaxing for me.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
So many different people talk here. They look like
they’re having fun... It makes me happy to see.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
It’s such a warm and welcoming atmosphere,
where I can stop and take a breath.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
When you think about it, a marathon relay is a lot
like a team battle.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
Everyone helps each other as they strive toward
the same goal...
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
It motivates you to try harder than you would if
you were running on your own!
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
When someone’s been kind to me, it really leaves
a lasting impression.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
And I believe those warm memories motivate me
to work hard and help me become kinder.
ch0113_00_mikan_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
So, this might be for selfish reasons, but...I want
to keep giving those warm feelings to someone
else.
